title: 非正常退出
author: HFJHT
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-7-6 16:25 编辑 

错误日志：---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Time: 20-7-6 ÏÂÎç2:44
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated

replies.author: WYL0zhu
replies.txt_content: 显卡没有支持OpenGL的问题，更新显卡驱动并升级Java版本即可。

replies.author: xw390
replies.txt_content: java应该是最新了，建议更新显卡驱动

replies.author: 土豆马拉松
replies.txt_content: 玩的久了就会自己卡退

replies.author: 参汣
replies.txt_content: 显卡的驱动出了点问题
